    • updateIndices

      private INDEX_RESULT[] updateIndices(String guess, String answer)
      This method updates the Indices, as in the the result of each letter of the guess by comparing with each letter of the answer
      Parameters:
      guess - a String which is the user Guess
      answer - a String which is the answer.
      Returns:
      an array of INDEX_RESULT representing the result of each slot

    • updateGuessedCharacters

      private void updateGuessedCharacters(String guess)
      This method updates the guessed characters array after every guess by comparing the guess with the answer.
      Parameters:
      guess - a String which is the user guess.

    • selectRandomAnswer

      private String selectRandomAnswer(Scanner dictionaryFile)
      This method generates a random answer at random for the game.
      Parameters:
      dictionaryFile - the txt file containing the list of valid words.
      Returns:
      String which is the generated random word.

    • isValidWord

      private boolean isValidWord(List<String> validWordList, String word)
      This method returns if the word is a valid word according to the dictionary
      Parameters:
      validWordList - a array of list of the valid words
      word - a String to check if it valid word or not.
      Returns:
      a boolean that represents if the word is valid or not.
